Books

I strongly believe in continuous learning. Whenever I start working on something new or need to understand something better, I’d pick a book on the subject and try to learn from the best.

Books

Branding

  • Logo Design Love by David Airey
  • Designing Brand Identity by Alina Wheeler

Business & Strategy

  • Why We Fail by Victor Lombardi
  • Hacking Growth by Morgan Brown and Sean Ellis
  • Trendology by Chris Kerns
